solution_line_template: An even split is {split_percent_num}%. If the monthly subscription is ${monthly_subscription}, but I pay only {split_percent_num}% that means I pay every month ${monthly_subscription}*{split_percent_num}%=$<<{monthly_subscription}*{split_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={monthly_payment}>>{monthly_payment}

We know that in 1 year there are {months_per_year} months. Therefore if each month I pay ${monthly_payment}, in {months_per_year} months I'd pay ${monthly_payment}*{months_per_year}=$<<{monthly_payment}*{months_per_year}={total_payment}>>{total_payment}
